entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is trying to rescue Ron from the statue.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is trapped in the statue.

entities.name: merman
entities.description: A seven-foot-tall merman with a long green beard and a choker of shark fangs.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to rescue Ron from the statue.
Harry tries to borrow a spear from the merman.
The merman refuses to help Harry and they have a conflict.
Harry uses rocks to hack at the ropes binding Ron.
